articles.title: 'I'm very tired': Virat Kohli's earnest request to Manjrekar in post-match interview after smashing 122* vs Pakistan - Hindustan Times

articles.content: Virat Kohli's century against Pakistan during the Asia Cup Super-4 match on Monday holds a special place for several compelling reasons. While he achieved the remarkable feat of becoming the fastest … [+3314 chars]
